values.value: Site Critical Element* - All employees working 6 feet or more (measured from the bottom of the foot) above ground or a lower level must use an applicable form of fall protection. Any elevated employee using a Personal Fall Arrest System (PFAS) as their fall protection method must ensure that at least one (1) of their PFAS lanyards or devices is connected to a structural anchorage at all times. Anchorage must be capable of holding a static load of 5,000 lbs. (3,600 lbs. minimum if an engineered anchorage is utilized). CFR 1926.501, ANSI A10.48, NATE CTS
Are all elevated employees maintaining 100% tie-off? (No one Free Climbing)
